scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:typedoc && npm run clean:esm && npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:rel
scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:exe
scripts.build:exe: npm run build:exe:linux && npm run build:exe:mac
scripts.build:exe:linux: npm run build:exe:linux:x86_64 && npm run build:exe:linux:aarch64
scripts.build:exe:mac: npm run build:exe:mac:x86_64 && npm run build:exe:mac:aarch64
scripts.release: npm run tar && npm run zip
scripts.tar: npm run tar:linux && npm run tar:mac
scripts.tar:linux: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|broker-linux|broker|' -czvf rel/broker-linux-x86.tar.gz broker-linux
scripts.tar:mac: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|broker-macos|broker|' -czvf rel/broker-mac-x86.tar.gz broker-macos
scripts.zip: npm run zip:linux && npm run zip:mac
scripts.zip:linux:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/broker-linux-x86.zip bin/broker-linux -j bin && printf '@ broker-linux
@=broker
' | zipnote -w rel/broker-linux-x86.zip
scripts.zip:mac:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/broker-mac-x86.zip bin/broker-macos -j bin && printf '@ broker-macos
@=broker
' | zipnote -w rel/broker-mac-x86.zip
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.examples: npm run examples:ts && npm run examples:esm
